content:
# The error indicates that I cannot place the Assembling Machine because it is no longer in my inventory. This suggests that the crafting operation may have consumed the item or that there was an issue with the inventory management.

# To resolve this, I need to check my inventory again to confirm the presence of the Assembling Machine. 
# If it is indeed missing, I will need to craft another one.

# Let's inspect the inventory to see if the Assembling Machine is present.
current_inventory = inspect_inventory()
print(f"Current inventory: {current_inventory}")

# If the Assembling Machine is not present, I will need to gather the necessary materials to craft another one:
# - 9 Iron Plates
# - 1 Iron Gear Wheel

# I currently have:
# - 5 Iron Gear Wheels
# - 5 Coal

# I will need to gather more Iron Plates and Iron Gear Wheels to craft another Assembling Machine.

# First, I will gather more Iron Ore to smelt into Iron Plates.
iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(iron_ore_position)
harvest_resource(iron_ore_position, quantity=10)  # Harvest additional iron ore

# Now, I will insert the iron ore into the furnace for smelting.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)  # Ensure the furnace has enough coal to smelt

# Wait for the smelting process to complete.
for _ in range(30):
    if inspect_inventory(furnace).get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0) >= 9:
        break
    sleep(1)

# After confirming that I have enough Iron Plates, I will craft another Assembling Machine.
if inspect_inventory().get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0) >= 9 and inspect_inventory().get(Prototype.IronGearWheel, 0) >= 1:
    craft_item(Prototype.AssemblingMachine1)  # Craft 1 Assembling Machine

# Finally, check the inventory again to see if the new Assembling Machine was crafted successfully.
print(f"Final inventory after crafting another assembling machine: {inspect_inventory()}")
